tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Badges ( badge_id INT PRIMARY KEY, badge_name VARCHAR(50), badge_description TEXT, student_id INT );
CREATE TABLE Achievements ( achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, achievement_name VARCHAR(50), achievement_description TEXT, student_id INT, date_achieved DATE );
CREATE TABLE Students ( student_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_name VARCHAR(50), student_email VARCHAR(50), date_joined DATE );
